abstract: The private equity business hit bumps. A deal was struck for a possible Dow Jones sale, and the Supreme Court struck down a longstanding rule on product pricing.
snippet: The private equity business hit bumps. A deal was struck for a possible Dow Jones sale, and the Supreme Court struck down a longstanding rule on product pricing.
lead_paragraph: THE private equity business hit bumps. A deal was struck for a possible Dow Jones sale, and the Supreme Court struck down a longstanding rule on product pricing.

headline.main: Backers of the Buyout Boom Seem to Be Backing Out
headline.print_headline: Backers of the Buyout Boom Seem to Be Backing Out
